title: Hell rat
data:
***Version [0.26](/0.26 "0.26")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all rodents, see [list of rodents](/List_of_rodents "List of rodents").*

| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A unusually large rat. Its weird, knobbly orange skin glows with the infernal energies that spawned it.***HAMLET \[Drawing his sword.]: How now! a rat? Dead, for a ducat, dead \[Stabs through the arras.] -William Shakespeare, \_The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark\_, III, 4. 1603. |

## Useful Info

**Hell rats** are an unusually dangerous breed of [rat](/List_of_rats "List of rats"). Like their weaker cousins, they have fairly low HP, but they move fast and have a powerful [draining](/Draining "Draining") bite. They can be found as the bosses of some [Sewer](/Sewer "Sewer") layouts, in packs in the [Lair](/Lair "Lair"), or in rat [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- Hell rats are thankfully rare in the early game, but finding one in the Sewers can prove very dangerous, and getting swarmed in the Lair can be extremely lethal. Do everything in your power to kill them at range, especially if you lack [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") resistance.
- They've got negligible [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") and very low [HD](/HD "HD"), so pretty much any negative [status conditions](/Status_condition "Status condition") you can hit them with should work.

## History

- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), hell rats were known as **orange rats**.

Hell rat

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.26: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all rodents, see list of rodents.

hell rat r 
HP 10-22
HD 3
XP 33
Speed 12
AC 7
EV 10
Will 20
Attack1 20 (bite: drain experience)


Resistances rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Demonic
Size Little
Type rat, hell rat
Flags Evil

Warm-blooded
A unusually large rat. Its weird, knobbly orange skin glows with the infernal energies that spawned it.

HAMLET [Drawing his sword.]: How now! a rat? Dead, for a ducat, dead [Stabs through the arras.]
-William Shakespeare, _The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark_, III, 4. 1603.

Useful Info

Hell rats are an unusually dangerous breed of rat. Like their weaker cousins, they have fairly low HP, but they move fast and have a powerful draining bite. They can be found as the bosses of some Sewer layouts, in packs in the Lair, or in rat vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • Hell rats are thankfully rare in the early game, but finding one in the Sewers can prove very dangerous, and getting swarmed in the Lair can be extremely lethal. Do everything in your power to kill them at range, especially if you lack negative energy resistance.
  • They've got negligible willpower and very low HD, so pretty much any negative status conditions you can hit them with should work.

History

  • Prior to 0.16, hell rats were known as orange rats.
